name: The Fleeting Tide
description:
The Fleeting Tide is a narrative focused take on the classic point and click adventure game. Play your way as you solve a darkly comic mystery generations in the making.

Travel to the mysterious Fleeting Manor to solve a heinous crime, explore the grounds and meet a cast of eccentric characters. In The Fleeting Tide there is no wrong way to play, your choices affect the characters and world, and give you your own unique version of the story. 

Will you be a thorough and conscientious investigator? 

Prefer to bully your way to the truth? 

Perhaps you believe the answers lie not in this world?

The mystery must be solved, but nobody says it has to be done properly.

  • Branching dialogue system
  • RPG Lite mechanics
  • Enjoy your own unique version of the story
  • Gather clues and interrogate suspects
  • Cel shaded art style
  • Alpha build of Act 1 of the game available to play.
  • NB; Demo is provided as is, this is an in development project and is liable to have bugs, crashes, wild mood swings, unfinished assets, spelling errors, and a lot of temporary\open source art. Everything is subject to change.
  • If you'd like to post a screenshot of the playthrough splashscreen at the end of the demo in the comments it would help immensely!

https://www.thefleetingtide.com/
